name: A Reluctant Spy
description:
You made a mistake on your last posting. You were just trying to have some fun. Now they have those damned photographs, and can ruin you unless you work for them.

Fulfil your handler's requests for documents. Maybe this will all blow over.

Made for #SpyJam. Prototype is up, and will probably undergo some changes until the end of the jam. Not been able to test the Linux/Mac builds yet. Had some problems with them recently, so let me know if you get an error and I will try to look into it.
